# Tab (fw-tab)

fw-tab provides child elements for fw-tabs, to enable tab style navigation.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                                      | Type     | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `message` | `message` | Message that is displayed when a user navigates away from a tab. | `string` | `undefined` |
| `title`   | `title`   | Name of the tab displayed on the UI.                             | `string` | `undefined` |
